title: Revolving Door Sunshine Act of 1993
content: Revolving Door Sunshine Act of 1993 - Amends the Government in the Sunshine Act to require former Presidents, Vice Presidents, and senior Federal appointees, as well as former Members of Congress and senior congressional staff members, to file, for a certain period after leaving Government, periodic reports with the appropriate entity which disclose certain communications made and other actions taken by them during the reporting period. Requires such reports to be made public. Authorizes sanctions in cases of noncompliance.
